Name: Harry Potter
Loyalty: Albus Dumbledore | Dumbledore's Army | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
Skills: Parseltongue| Defence Against the Dark Arts | Seeker
name: Harry Potter
description: The main character of the series. Orphaned son of James and Lily Potter, and Gryffindor student at Hogwarts. The husband of Ginny Weasley, father of James Sirius, Albus Severus and Lily Luna Potter.

Name: Ron Weasley
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Ron Weasley
description: Youngest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley who is best friends with Harry Potter and Hermione Granger. Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper, prefect, and member of Dumbledore's Army.

Name: Hermione Granger
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Hermione Granger
description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student in Harry's year and one of his best friends. Prefect and co-founder of Dumbledore's Army.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Job: Keeper of Keys and Grounds | Professor of Care of Magical Creatures
Loyalty: Albus Dumbledore | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
Skills: Resistant to stunning spells| above average strength | crossbowmanship
name: Rubeus Hagrid
description: Half-giant Hogwarts gamekeeper, and Care of Magical Creatures professor starting in Harry's third year. Member of the Order of the Phoenix. As a Hogwarts student, he was expelled in his third year.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Neville Longbottom
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

Name: Ginny Weasley
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Ginny Weasley
description: Only daughter and youngest child of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Gryffindor student one year below Harry, Quidditch Seeker and Chaser, and member of Dumbledore's Army. Wife of Harry Potter.

Name: Sirius Black
name: Sirius Black
description: Harry's godfather who was a close friend of Harry's father James. Escapee from Azkaban prison and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries by his cousin Bellatrix Lestrange.

Name: Remus Lupin
Job: Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts
Skills: Exceptionally gifted in Defence Against the Dark Arts
name: Remus Lupin
description: Lycanthropic Gryffindor student before Harry's time who befriended Sirius Black and James Potter. Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts in Harry's third year, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. He and his wife Nymphadora Tonks gave birth to a son, Teddy, before dying in the Battle of Hogwarts.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Job: Professor of Transfiguration | Head of Gryffindor
Loyalty: Albus Dumbledore | Order of the Phoenix | Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Minerva McGonagall
description: Hogwarts Transfiguration professor, Head of Gryffindor House, Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Assumes position of Hogwarts Headmaster for a time after Voldemort's death.

Name: Arthur Weasley
Job: Head of the Misuse of Muggle Artefacts Office
Loyalty: Order of the Phoenix| British Ministry of Magic
name: Arthur Weasley
description: Muggle-obsessed Ministry of Magic employee, and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Husband of Molly Weasley, father of Bill, Charlie, Percy, Fred, George, Ron, and Ginny Weasley.

Name: Cho Chang
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army |Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Cho Chang
description: Ravenclaw Quidditch Seeker one year above Harry, and his first love interest. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Loyalty: Dumbledore's Army |Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Luna Lovegood
description: Xenophilius Lovegood's daughter and Ravenclaw student one year below Harry. Member of Dumbledore's Army and wife of Newt Scamander's grandson Rolf.

Name: Severus Snape
Job: Professor of Potions | Head of Slytherin
Skills: Extremely skilled at potions and Occlumency
name: Severus Snape
description: Potions and later Defence Against the Dark Arts professor at Hogwarts. Head of Slytherin House, and member of both the Death Eaters and the Order of the Phoenix as a double agent spying for Dumbledore.

Name: Draco Malfoy
name: Draco Malfoy
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Quidditch Seeker, prefect, and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

Name: Vincent Crabbe
name: Vincent Crabbe
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year and the son of a Death Eater. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad. Killed by his own Fiendfyre spell.

Name: Gregory Goyle
name: Gregory Goyle
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Skills: She is a duellist of great skill and an experienced Occlumens
name: Bellatrix Lestrange
description: Cousin of Sirius Black. Death Eater who tortured Neville Longbottom's parents Frank and Alice into insanity. Killed by Molly Weasley during the Battle of Hogwarts.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
name: Lucius Malfoy
description: Draco's father and an influential Death Eater. Governor of Hogwarts early in the series.

Name: Cedric Diggory
name: Cedric Diggory
description: Hufflepuff student and prefect two years above Harry. Quidditch Seeker and captain, and co-winner of the Triwizard Tournament. Killed by Peter Pettigrew on Lord Voldemort's command.

Name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
description: Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Replaces Pius Thicknesse as Minister for Magic.

Name: Argus Filch
Loyalty: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
name: Argus Filch
description: Squib caretaker of Hogwarts.
